title: Authors and Citation
text: Edgar Treischl. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Treischl E (2024). gist: Manage GitHub Gist. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://edgar-treischl.github.io/gist/index.html.
code: @Manual{,   title = {gist: Manage GitHub Gist},   author = {Edgar Treischl},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://edgar-treischl.github.io/gist/index.html}, }

title: Manage GitHub Gist
text: gist package provides set functions work GitHub Gist. allows create, read, update delete gists via GitHub API. Moreover, provides R Studio adding - shiny app - interact gists.

title: Manage GitHub Gist
text: can install development version gist like : order retrieve data, need provide GitHub API token (github_api) keyring package. Use key_set() function code save token:
code: devtools::install_github("edgar-treischl/gist") #Save GitHub API token as github_api keyring::key_set(service = "github_api")

title: Manage GitHub Gist
text: Go addin menu use following code open gist app:  want interact via CLI, can use following functions: work files, package includes get, create, delete functions. following code shows get gist:
code: #Run gist_addin() gist::gist_addin() #gistfiles lists all files and returns names and ids gist::gistfiles() #>                   file                               id #> 1        DBI_connect.R 102ea02b27520c8735fe034965bbaaaf #> 2            RSQLite.R aba7bea4c37aa3788d32820c5b5e8894 #> 3              clear.R 27a596e3c9cf3b533936e771a01d840f #> 4  cli_progress_step.R c0a0c0485afd7b0b48101e86a5dd1b3c #> 5         dotwhisker.R 725f9b302453c9456e6dcc546760a0d4 #> 6           get_spss.R 491c63ec730fe156d8c3139ac21d978b #> 7           gitcreds.R e00be278d451534ccac1862ac96987e2 #> 8       github_setup.R 8982bf396011c3694b39756873fd1476 #> 9              lintr.R f4168506926cf63c9ab48aaa823d62aa #> 10             log4r.R 7717aa217f4f3eda06ab0b2b224cb52f #> 11          mclapply.R 49f8a5396325c0a6827740b7b49e23be #> 12    package_create.R c579aaeecd3eaa4cdd019c04ef49d133 #> 13    pandoc_convert.R b37e188d61bb08efa9aa8a53d0133f95 #> 14             sqldf.R 076dd0c4b87e6c0e721f03a275a58082 #gistfiles lists all files and returns names and ids gist::get_gist("DBI_connect.R") #> ✔ Copied DBI_connect.R from your GitHub account.

title: Create Gist file — create_gist
text: function create_gist() creates new Gist file.

title: Create Gist file — create_gist
text: name name file. code code character. description description code character.

title: Create Gist file — create_gist
text: Message successful.

title: Delete Gist files — delete_gist
text: careful: function delete_gist() deletes Gist file.

title: Delete Gist files — delete_gist
text: id id Gist file (gistfiles).

title: Delete Gist files — delete_gist
text: Message file successfully deleted.

title: Get Gist file — get_gist
text: function get_gist() copies Gist file.

title: Get Gist file — get_gist
text: filename file name gist file. description TRUE, function returns description Gist. raw Get raw text string copy

title: Get Gist file — get_gist
text: Message successful.

title: The gist addin — gist_addin
text: gist_addin() creates shiny app manage gists. Pick gist, press copy insert button code insert. Furthermore can create delete gists well.

title: List all Gist files — gistfiles
text: function gistfiles() returns Gists file.

title: List all Gist files — gistfiles
text: arrange files arranged alphabetically.

title: List all Gist files — gistfiles
text: Data frame file names id.
